message.body: Hey man great to see you, keep in touch and let me know what you're up to from time to time. I'll have to make sure I swing by your studio with my girlfriend if I return in June and of course you'll have to come down to Laguna for a beach day.
I look forward to it. And I would love to get your input on the publication I plan on doing. Have a safe trip back! Be well my friend.
Great thanks! Send it to me anytime you can.
